item.title: S Chand & Company Ltd’s Mixed Week: +0.13% Price, Bearish Technical Signals Dominate
item.description: S Chand & Company Ltd closed the week with a modest gain of 0.13%, inching up to Rs.159.45 from Rs.159.25, while the Sensex outperformed slightly with a 0.39% rise to 36,674.32. The week was marked by a valuation upgrade, a significant downgrade to Strong Sell by MarketsMOJO, and a bearish technical momentum shift, all influencing the stock’s subdued price action amid mixed market conditions. Time: 1 minute ago

item.title: Shrenik Ltd’s Volatile Week: -2.33% Amid Circuit Hits and Strong Selling Pressure
